item.description: Fun for friendly dogs & their owners. We have fenced in areas for the dogs to play (dogs need to be up to date with vaccines) and snacks for the humans. Let's all get together and have some with fun with our pets & some great conversations about them too! We have also started a blog at our center and will be photographing your playing pets to show folks the fun we have! (with your permission).

group.name: The Bethany Friendly Dog Meetup Group

item.name: Bethany Friendly Dog Meetup Group. 9am-11am
